---
title: "WGL_DATA_2024"
format: html
editor: visual
editor_options: 
  chunk_output_type: console
---

## Setup

```{r}
library(tidyverse)

# read in a data file
df <- read.csv("data/22FEB24_PREFIELD-TEST.TXT")
```

## Inspect

```{r}
df |> 
  mutate(n = row_number()) |> 
  pivot_longer(cols = -n, values_to = "value", names_to = "measurement") |> 
  ggplot() +
  aes(
    x = n,
    y = value,
    color = measurement
  ) +
  geom_point() +
  facet_grid(vars(measurement), scales = "free_y") +
  labs(
    x = "Reading",
    y = "",
    title = "Test Submersion: 22 Feb 2024"
  ) +
  theme_bw() +
  theme(
    legend.position = "None"
  )
```
